01/10/2012 - 14:12 Normal Service

Metrolink services

A 6 minute service is operating on the Bury and Altrincham lines.

A 12 minute service is operating on the Eccles/MediaCityUK line.

A 12 minute service is operating between Oldham Mumps and St Werburghs Road.


Woodlands Road Stop is only open for services to Bury, Piccadilly & Altrincham between the hours of 10:00 & 16:00 Monday to Friday (excluding bank holidays)

Passengers intending to travel from Woodlands Road on Saturday or Sunday are requested to use the Abraham Moss stop




For further information please contact:

Customer Services
0161 205 2000

Metrolink RATP Dev Ltd.
Metrolink House
Queens Road
Manchester
M8 ORY
